ygData.subject: Lost Faith
ygData.msgSnippet: I was hunting the other day and my tank pull 3 things. Thats ok, we can handle 3 things, but after my first heal the other two agroed on me (that to be
ygData.messageBody:
I was hunting the other day and my tank pull 3
things. Thats ok, we can handle 3 things, but after my
first heal the other two agroed on me (that to be
expected). My tank, after i had called help 4 times let me
die. <br> I went though my invunerablity spells like
nothing. So after words me and my tank had a little talk.
How if he doesn't help me we all die. <br> The tank
said he knew what he was doing, but the creature he
was killing was almost dead. He though a cleric could
take 2 agroes.<br> After the little talking to I let
him out of the group. Mind this was not the first
time he did not releave the agroes of me.<br> Was i
justified in taking him out of my group. i would like to
hear your what you have to say.<br><br>The dark elf
cleric Fefelafuw.<br><br>ps i hate hell lvls
